original_text: Whyyy! Why are you shooting an ally?
Hey, that's an ally you are shooting.
Hey hey, what are you doing?
They are aiming at our ammo rack!
zhtw: 他們衝著我們的彈藥架來啦！

original_text: The possibility of ammo rack explosion is increased!
Aiming at the ammo rack? They are not fighting fair!
zhtw: 瞄準彈藥架？這招太不公平了吧！

original_text: Are they aiming at the ammo rack? Be careful!
zhtw: 他們在打彈藥架？大家小心啊！

original_text: Penetration failed. Don't worry about it!
It's okay, load the next shell quickly.
It'll be a-okay if we penetrate them next time!
It's alright, we are hitting them!
zhtw: 沒問題！我們狠狠打中他們啦！

original_text: That's a ricochet. Get ready to load the next one!
It's okay, we'll pen them next time!
It's okay, keep calm and load the next shell.
Please hold it up while I take a little rest.
Our training wasn't enough. Let's do some special workout as soon as we get back.
zhtw: 訓練不夠啊！回去加練特訓！

original_text: Sometimes we lose, but we go again!
Not good. Maybe we should change the training menu.
zhtw: 不妙！回去得換訓練計畫！

original_text: Close one! We'll land it next time!
We'll get a direct hit next time!
They are aiming at our driver! You okay?
zhtw: 他們瞄準駕駛員！沒事吧？
駕駛員受傷！有人能頂上嗎？

original_text: They hit our driver's seat! Mobility will be reduced!
zhtw: 駕駛座被打中！機動性下降！

original_text: Nice shot! It caused a fire!
They are on fire! Lucky us!
Enemy vehicle in flames! Keep pushing!
I see a fire there! Are they okay?
Fire in the enemy vehicle confirmed!
We started a fire! Good job!
zhtw: 我們點燃了他們！棒極了！

original_text: Seem like they are on fire, good luck!
Alright! One less enemy to deal with!
Enemy vehicle destroyed! Let's keep it up!
Enemy vehicle destroyed! Stay alert and let's go!
Enemy vehicle destroyed! Don't sweat it!
Nice! We destroyed them! On to the next one!
We've successfully taken out the enemy!
They hit our engine! Be aware of reduced mobility!
zhtw: 引擎被打中！機動性下降啦！

original_text: They are aiming at our engine! Be careful!
We're having trouble with our engine!
Engine damaged! We can't go too fast!
Engine repaired! We can move again!
Fire detected! Put it out now!
Fire! Stay calm and extinguish it!
We're burning! Put out the fire!
Fuel tank hit! Watch for fire!
Fuel tank damaged! This is bad!
They hit our fuel tank! Be careful!
Fuel tank hit! Don't let it ignite!
zhtw: 油箱中彈！別讓它燒起來！

original_text: Aiming for fuel tank? Not fair!
zhtw: 瞄準油箱？太不公平了吧！

original_text: Gunner's seat hit! Hang in there!

zhtw: 裝填座被打中！裝填變慢！

original_text: Radio operator injured! Hang in there!
Radio operator's seat damaged! Be careful!

zhtw: 遠程通訊斷了！無線電壞了！
無線電故障！無遠程通訊！

original_text: Observation device is hit! Be careful!
Our observation device is about to break!
The enemy is targeting the observation device.
zhtw: 敵人瞄準我們的觀測裝置！
打中我們的觀測裝置了！

original_text: Observation device is hit! Be aware!
Observation device destroyed! It is useless now!
I can't see! The observation device is destroyed!
zhtw: 啥也看不見！觀測裝置炸了！

original_text: They destroyed our observation device. The enemy is not bad.
zhtw: 觀測裝置被他們炸了！敵人挺強！

original_text: The observation device has been destroyed!
The observation device is broken! Get it repaired!
The observation device is back online! Thank you!
Our view range is now back to normal!
Emergency repair of the observation device is now complete.
zhtw: 觀測裝置緊急修復完成！

original_text: Repair completed! View range is back to normal!
The observation device has been repaired! We can see outside clearly now.
zhtw: 觀測裝置修好！外面看得一清二楚！

original_text: Alright! The observation device has been fixed!
Thank you! View range is back now!
Repair is complete, should be able to see now!
Yes, we can see clearly now! It's been fixed!
The observation device is back online! We can resume scouting!
zhtw: 觀測裝置恢復！繼續偵察！

original_text: The emergency repair of our observation device is now complete!
zhtw: 觀測裝置緊急修復完成！

original_text: Yes, we've fixed the observation device!
The observation device is back online! Good job!
Enemy vehicle in our sights! Let's go!
Great! We got them in our sights!
Chasing them too far is not good!
Let's take aim at a different target!
Let's focus on a different target!
Let the others deal with that one!
Let's deal with a different vehicle first.
We'll focus on a different vehicle for now!
They are trying to break our track, be careful.
zhtw: 他們想斷我們履帶！小心！

original_text: Their target is our tracks, be careful!
zhtw: 瞄準我們的履帶！注意啊！

original_text: Track hit! It won't withstand another shot.
zhtw: 履帶中彈！再來一擊就完了！

original_text: Stay calm! Fix them at once!
We are immobilized! Fix the tracks now! Hurry up!
They got our tracks! They are not fighting fair!
zhtw: 履帶被打斷！他們太不公平啦！

original_text: Thank you! We can move again!
Turret damaged! Turn speed is reduced!
The turret rotation mechanism has been destroyed!
They've destroyed the turret rotation mechanism!
zhtw: 砲塔旋轉機構被他們炸了！

original_text: Huh? We can't move the turret!
Why!? The turret is not moving!
Alright! The turret has been fixed!
The turret is now repaired! Thank you!
This is the end. It's a shame but they are a level above us.
zhtw: 結束啦！真可惜，他們比我們強！

original_text: It's never easy. That's Sensha-Do, huh?
zhtw: 真不容易！這就是戰車道吧？

original_text: That was good fun. Let's do it again.
We're going to go over what happened here.
We have to accept defeat if we tried our best. Good match!
zhtw: 盡力了就接受失敗！好比賽！
